mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, FUNCTION3, FUNCTION11, FUNCTION8, SEARCHNAME, FUNCTION9, SORT, FUNCTION13, FUNCTION6, FUNCTION7, FUNCTION12, FUNCTIONNAME, FUNCTION2, FUNCTION4, FUNCTION14, FUNCTION1, FUNCTION10, SEARCHID, FUNCTIONID, FUNCTION15, FUNCTION5, SQLWHERE, DESCR from db_addaction where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
